attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
i want the prime minister to change the law of OFSTED arriving expectedly towards schools, i feel that they should arrive unexpectedly to schools because if they arrive expected the children are alwas warned, they are told to be polite, lessons are planned in advance, and the teachers are in a happier mood with the children.i feel that this should be abolished and that OFSTED should arrive unexpectedly to see what the school is really like because most of the time the lesons and manners are nothing of the same 
i decided to do this petition because i am a thirteen year old boy who when OFSTED arrived at our school noticed a huge difference
please sign this pettition and abolish the law
